content.detailedDescription: I was outside going to change a brake light when i decided to look up at the sky just to gaze when i saw this huge thing in the sky kinda like a plane but it wasent it was bright and flashed and then sped up and disapeared before my eyes no sound came from it either,i was kinda in shock and in awe of it and searched the sky for it but didnt see anything then i went inside and looked up other sightings and noticed some people have had the same kinda experience.
content.summary: Bright flash before my eyes then disapeared

content.detailedDescription: Camping trip on a perfectly clear evening at the lake.  there is absolute pitch dark except for stars in sky and a tiny crescent moon on the lower horizon.We are around the campfire sky-watching and my 9 yr old son sees what he thought was a plane originally until the light takes on a zig-zag path then north, then south, back & forth over the sky.Husband grabs binoculars and all 3 of us witnessed a glowing, multi/overlapping spherical thing is best way to describe.Shape reminds me of that spirograph toy thing when i was a kid.It's like pulsating,almost like it's breathing and there's this black hole-like thing within that appears to expand & contract.The sphere seems to dim when the hole thing is expanding and lights are more bright and vivid when hole becomes small. it moves overhead,way up high, back & forth,side to side and we observe this for nearly an hour as it seems to go higher & higher until it damn well looks like a star and then stations itself in a permanent place in the south sky - camouflaged just blending in with the rest of the stars!I watched and kept eye through the binoculars and could still make out the glowing spherical part of it to tell it apart from the other stars in the sky.My son said he started to feel 'weird' but i mostly think he was somewhat amazed & freaked out about the idea of potential aliens overhead.I am a licensed psychotherapist in great falls, mt and believe me this is what we all saw.  pretty incredible and wish i could draw you a picture of the glowing,spherical thing that night.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Brilliant/glowing spherical-thru binocilars see pulsating and overlapping spheres

content.detailedDescription:
From a professor at georgia tech: 
i run a ufo camera in highlands.  i got the attached 3 frames on august 22st around 5 pm.  the object goes from the left to the right of the video frame.  it moves across the frame in 1 second.  my frame rate was approximately one frame each .25 seconds.  start viewing �gpossible ufo-2 22 04�h  then �gpossible ufo -2 22 04.5�h  then �gpossible ufo -2 22 05�h.  that sequence will take you from left to right which is the order for viewing (left to right).
i have magnified the object and it does not look like a bird or insect.  i am sending you the high resolution version so that you can see the object in detail.  i have never seen an aircraft that low in the mountains.  the speed is what is interesting.  it goes from right to left in just over a second.
it is a true ufo, but it could have an explanation if  better video quality were available
content.summary: This is from a professor at georgia tech.  he has a camera at his house in highlands, north carolina.  here is what he sent me:

content.detailedDescription: Ok, names david. never done this before. this is what i saw. on tuesday sept 2nd, 2014, i was walking my dog enjoying the fresh air and watching the beautiful color of sky and clouds as the sun was setting. in the western sky, i saw a small white dot moving north. so far off, at first i was a little excited as i thought morning might be iss station. i continued walking about another minute and looked up again. same object in sky but now, please don't laugh, another object appeared almost as if it popped in, no, it didn't come out of a cloud bank either, just appeared. i watched as both objects headed towards each other, then, literally, stopped and headed in different directions. wasn't scared, just a little bewildered and amazed. looked around for someone else walking or neighbors outside to ask if they saw what i was seeing, of course, no one. watched sky again and finished walk looking up severs times again but saw nothing. i'm in dayton, ohio right near wpafb so could have been anything. i checked online. nothing at the moment. called ohio ufo, never done this before mind you, spoke with fellow he requested i fill this out. thank you for your time. it was probably nothing so i'm very sorry if i wasted anyone's time. thanks again. sincerely, david
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Two objects close to each other seen in western sky as sun set on tuesday sept 2nd, 2014 around 8pm.

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside my house with my neighbours watching the ufo hovering over my towns tor. 

we could see two sets of lights .. one blue and one set white  on the outside of the ship
content.summary: Big .. very big with a set of two coloured lights on the side of it

content.detailedDescription: I have witnessed two different events which i can describe as an orb around a cloud formation that looked like a round rainbow. there was a hum that could not explain its origin . took pic both times (july , august 2014 la jolla ca). both photos had the same white sphere in it that i only noticed  today, sept,2nd 2014.
content.summary: Took picture of orb like and only noticed later the object

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and 2 daughters pulled up to my parents house about 8:30pm. i got out looked up in the sky and said to my husband, "look at that light - it's going to fast to be a plane and i've never seen that color light before." we watched it for about 30 seconds and then it went out. i went into my parents house and almost immediately my husband called me back outside. we all went out and saw 4 more orange orb things coming in a v like formation coming from the west, one more came from the middle behind them. the one on the right came about 80 degrees above us and it's light went out. we could all see a dark craft that looked like a flat,  diamondish shape hovering above us.I would say it was the size of a boeing 747. it kind of zig zagged a bit and then took off like a bullet to the north. the other four orange orbs went past us towards the west and then their lights went off. during the whole time there was no sound from any of them. a helicopter flew pretty close to the lights on the left and then quickly flew off. 

we were amazed. my dad is a retired pastor. we really aren't the kind of people that are out looking for ufo's in the sky. my daughters are 10 years old and they were a bit freaked out. my husband recorded the end of it with his cell phone. you can't really see much except for the lights.
content.summary: I saw 6 total bright orange orb like crafts one turned off lights and saw shape

content.detailedDescription: Approx 8 am was walking to stables to feed chickens, noticed a large circle on the lawn approx 10 foot across.  this was outlined in white which appeared to be an ice like material, even though the temperature was about 12 degrees c which disappeared when touched.  upon closer inspection, there were 4 circles, the larger then decreasing in size to the smallest approx 2 feet across.  i proceeded to take photographs.  in the afternoon i went back to the area and the lawn is discolored, and the clear outline is still evident.  i have no explanation.
content.summary: Circles discovered on lawn x 4 - am and pm

content.detailedDescription: Family and neighborhood kids were outside in front yard in july of 1954. mother and father sitting on front porch watching us kids playing in the front yard. it was dark but with plenty of light to see one another at close range. soon a glowing(green)cigar shaped object came into view approximately 2 to 3 feet off of the ground. the object was about 8 inches long and 3 inches wide. the kids started screaming and pointing at the object. i and others were trying to catch it. every time we tried it would move away. there were no sounds of any kind coming from the glowing object. i asked my parents if they could help us catch it. they were not able to see it. it was at this time i tried to catch it again and gave chase with all of the other kids in pursuit. the object went straight into a neighbors open garage and up to the top of the garage were it went into a crawl space out of site. the owner of the home came out and looked into the attic for the object. he was not able to find it so we left and went back home. it was real the object as all of us kids could see it and were able to chase it. both of my parents could not acknowledge what we had seen. my friends thoughts of that day were as mine. we saw and chased something that we had never seen before.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A glowing green cigar like object. 3

content.detailedDescription:
Sunday night august 31, 2014, i was watching television in our great room and out of the big windows that open to woods behind our house, i saw a light so unusual that i jumped out of my chair to look at it.  i realized that i had seen it about two nights earlier just very briefly as it passed byï¿½ but at the time gave it no thought other than it was characteristically unusual but did not stop.  that time i jumped up too, it was so odd.   
the spherical light appeared at 8:15 pm by clearing the trees.  in fact, i could see that something was preparing to emerge, it was so bright.   
the nature of the light that was so unusual is not only its brilliance, but that it appeared to be constructed of many hundreds of ï¿½raysï¿½ that were a bit wider at the origin of the sphere, but which became pointed at the outside of its halo.  i have seen many different lights, spotlights, strobes, brilliant incandescent, fluorescent, etcï¿½ but never anything of this nature.  nothing like this has ever been part of any type of aircraft that i am aware of either.
the light hovered for about 2 minutes and was constantly lit.   it came from precisely 240 degrees, or nnw, and just floated and was probably 1-2 miles away...Although it was hard to be precise.  the angle was 15 degrees from the horizon.   almost anywhere between us and 2 miles distant would place if over the undeveloped western shore of blue springs lake.
it was a bright light unlike anything i have ever seen, but then moved away to our left in the general direction that would lead to lakeland lake, and out of sight.  when it turned westerly, what may have been behind it appeared as a red second light almost as large as the first.  it may also have morphed into toï¿½ canï¿½t say for sure.  the front one very bright yellowish white, the second was red.   the lights stayed on, but did seem to pulse. 
i have attached one of the photos i took.  unfortunately the camera in my phone could not capture the detail of the ï¿½raysï¿½ i mentioned.
content.summary: Very unusual and bright sphere which hovered and then changed direction as two lights.

content.detailedDescription: Ìíå áûëî 7 ëåò. ïîçäíèì âå÷åðîì â ìàå 1993 ãîäà ÿ ñèäåë çà ñòîëîì âî äâîðå ìîåãî äîìà ¹50 ïî óëèöå êóéáûøåâà â àäëåðñêîì ðàéîíå ãîðîäà ñî÷è è ó÷èë áóêâàðü, ÷òî áû ñäåëàòü ñþðïðèç ìàòåðè, êîòîðàÿ äîëæíà áûëà ñêîðî ïðèëåòåòü èç ðóìûíèè. âíåçàïíî ÿ óñëûøàë ðåâ ñàìîëåòà (ìû æèâåì ðÿäîì ñ àýðîïîðòîì) è ïîäíÿâ âçãëÿä ÿ óâèäåë êàê íàä ñîñåäíèì äâîðîì íà ðàññòîÿíèè ïðèìåðíî 8 ìåòðîâ îò ìåíÿ è íà âûñîòå ïðèìåðíî 3 ìåòðà íàä çåìëåé î÷åíü ìåäëåííî (3 - 6 êì/÷) ëåòåë äèñê ïðèìåðíî 2 - 3 ìåòðà â äèàìåòðå è îêîëî 1 ìåòðà âûñîòîé, âûïóêëûé ñ îáîèõ ñòîðîí (ñâåðõó è ñíèçó) è íà âåðõíåé åãî ÷àñòè íàõîäèëèñü êâàäðàòíûå îêíà, â êîòîðûõ áûë âèäåí æåëòûé ñâåò. ß, íå ïðèäàâ óâèäåííîìó íèêàêîãî çíà÷åíèÿ, ñðàçó æå îòâåðíóëñÿ è ñòàë ïðîäîëæàòü ó÷èòü áóêâû, è ÷åðåç ñåêóíä 30 ÿ âäðóã ïîíÿë, ÷òî óâèäåë íëî, òîãäà ÿ ïîñìîòðåë ñíîâà â òî ìåñòî, íî íè ÷åãî íå îáíàðóæèë, ïîñëå ÷åãî âûáåæàë íà óëèöó è îñìîòðåë âñå íåáî íàäî ìíîé, íî îïÿòü æå íè÷åãî îñîáåííîãî íå çàìåòèë. â ýòîò ìîìåíò ÿ ðåøèë çàïîìíèòü óâèäåííîå ìíîé, ÷òî áû ðàññêàçàòü êîìó-íèáóäü â áóäóùåì ïðè óäîáíîì ñëó÷àå, òàê êàê íå ìîã ðàññêàçàòü ýòî ñðàçó ïîòîìó, ÷òî ïî-äåòñêè èñïóãàëñÿ íàñìåøåê.
content.summary: Êðóãëûé äèñê ñ îêíàìè â âåðõíåé ÷àñòè. ìåäëåííî ëåòåë íà óðîâíå 3 ìåòðîâ íàä çåìëåé è ìåäëåííî âðàùàëñÿ âîêðóã ñâîåé îñè

content.detailedDescription: I was going out to get my phone charger. saw this huge orange craft hovering with objects hovering beside it like it was going into it . what i thought when i first noticed it was is that the moon then i looked quickly for the moon but their was no moon out. it was in a stationary position with a orange glow an a ribs coming off the back of it. then the ribs slowly went away an formed into one solid form lost sight of it when i went to grab my changer real fast with in a few seconds it was gone the whole time their was a airplane that flew over after an during the sighting. this object was so bright you could even see the other plane around until it was over in five mins.
content.summary: Orange craft with rib like structure coming out of the back of it then slow goes away in to one solid form. bigger than a nfl football structure.

content.detailedDescription: Two red balls of light appeared slightly above sightline of trees. flew in a straight line, without sound, a short distance to observer's left, travelling nw, before leaving sight line. a helicopter appeared shortly thereafter without incident.
content.summary: Two red balls of light travelled to the left, nw, no sound.

content.detailedDescription:
As reported to asd by phone - witness wishes to remain anonymous. 

i was driving north on range line road (49 hwy) in joplin on my way home from work at 10:15 pm when i noticed some lights hovering over the trees to my right as i approached redding road. as i got closer i could see the dark outline of a craft that looked oval in shape from the bottom. it had lights all over the bottom which were large orange lights and small blue lights which pulsated, getting brighter and dimmer. there was no sound. as i approached, the radio speakers made a strange static noise even though my radio was not on. my headlights went off and on again. i pulled to the side of the highway because i was afraid my engine would fail and also to get a better look at the object and take a picture, but i could not get my cell phone to come on. i probably watched it for 10 minutes total time. the object was hovering just over the trees probably 100' from the ground and 100' or less from me. the object then moved slightly and then took off very fast directly east from where it was hovering. i know it was not a plane or helicopter because there were no navigation lights and no sound. it was close enough to be heard. this has me very concerned and i'd like to know what it was - military or otherwise.
content.summary: Huge ufo hovering very close to highway then took off very quickly

content.detailedDescription:
I was at home on my balcony smoking a cigarette around 2 a.M.  i live in a semi-rural area a couple of miles due south of pinnacle mountain state park.  i first noticed the object when i looked up at the sky which was clear that night.  i'm normally not up at that time of night, but i had a bad case of insomnia.

i thought the object was a helicopter or plane at first, but it's light patterns were strange and it had too many blinking lights for an aircraft. i have never seen an object like it in the sky before.

it rose steadily in the sky and away from my position.  it slowly descended on two occasions and then rose again slowly.  it wobbled (atmospheric effects?) like it was a fishing bob on choppy water.  i watched it for an hour or so until it rose out of sight.  it never moved in a horizontal direction for any significant distance but it did move away from my position in a northeasterly direction.

i had no binoculars or telescope to be able to make out the object in precise detail, but it appeared cone shape - like a toy spinning top with lights on the cone and on the bottom in a circular pattern which i could see as it wobbled.  the lights were green, red, yellow, and sometimes bright white or blue.

the strangest thing about the event occurred approximately 15-20 minutes after i first sighted the object.  an extremely large helicopter, virtually silent, came in from the east, going west, just north of the apartment complex i live in.  i could make out the shape of the helicopter, but none of the details on it.  it was jet black, with no lights on in the cabin.  it couldn't have been further than a football field away from me.  i could barely hear the rotors on it.  it had only red running lights and none of these lights were blinking.  it looked like it was rectangular shape.  the closest variant i could even come close to comparing it to is the ch-53 super stallion - but that's just a guess.  it was moving very fast at about 300 feet of altitude.  i live in a valley (chenal valley), it flew over the western edge of the valley and i lost sight of it. 

to be honest, i just assumed i was seeing venus or the atmospheric distortion of a star.  i've seen it twice now since that night, but it does not appear every night.  i saw it again last night and used binoculars to verify the shape and lighting configuration which match what i saw with the naked eye.  i saw it around 10 pm last night in the same position i saw it in at 2 a.M. on the 12th.  it rose in the sky (like a star or planet), until i could no longer make out it's shape or coloring.

please someone just confirm that i saw a planet or star and the blinking colors were just air pollution refracting the light and i can move on with my life.  i accept that my eyes could be playing tricks on me.
content.summary: Hovers, wobbles. not a star or planet.  multiple blinking lights. cone shape on top - disc-like at bottom with circle of lights on bottom of disc.  seen several nights but not every night.  similar to object reported in berryville.

content.detailedDescription:
On the 27th august i had been in the garden for a smoke when i noticed how starry the night was (this was unusual because the sky is usually foggy looking/overcast) & to my left (nw) i saw what looked like a orange star, didnt think much of it & went in. about an hour later the motion sensor of the cctv on the back garden came on & i saw 2 lights that looked to me at first like glowing eyes. they were high up in the sky & swooped fast into the garden, lights then looked dim. the movement of these was strange, it seemed as though they were scanning around the garden then would shoot off again & return. the direction path wasnt the same coming from different directions but always coming back over the garden & this sort of scanning movement. throughout the activity the motion sensor of the cameras was on constantly & it went on for nearly two hours then moved further back to another house & the same movement again. ive never seen anything like this & it really freaked me out. my son also witnessed it.
the following night at around the same time it returned but this time at the front of the house. the weather was bad on this night, raining heavily & very windy & the movement of it was more erratic. my sons bedroom window was open near where this was & i ran to close it & these lights seemed to zero in then on the window, repeatedly backing up & launching at the window id just closed. i really thought this thing was trying to get in. on this occassion all the family witnessed it & we were all freaked out, couldnt understand what it was but scared. on this night it stayed for about an hour, flicking around the garden, cars, flying off then coming back. my son opened a window but we couldnt see anything with the naked eye, only the cctv with infa red picked this activity up. again the motion sensor of the cameras remained on constantly while this was around, returning to normal when it left
can you offer an explanation please as to what this is?
content.summary: Strange lights caught on cctv for two consecutive nights

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling northbound on i-15 towards las vegas. a friend told me about her family's connection to whiskey pete's casino, so i stopped long enough to take a picture of the place and the sign. as i was getting ready to drive again, i saw the bright light moving quickly to the north (away from the sign), parallel to that mountain range. it appeared to descend for a split second, then went slightly back up, reversed its direction (back towards the sign)and flashed brightly and disappeared. i have no idea what it was, but it was amazing. enough for me to want to report it to you. that is all the information i have. thank you for taking time to consider what i have submitted.
content.summary: Stopped to take a picture of whiskey pete's sign. it appeared and i snapped the photo.

content.detailedDescription: Round with lights and a tail with smaller lights    very big
content.summary: Round with lights with a tail that  had lightsi has standing by my pool

content.detailedDescription:
I'm teased form many round of military airplane that fly over the town,
i am gone out from the home to see what happens! and i think that they are here for military training because there are little military base near town!
i observe the sky to find the military airplane and past one minute i have see one military airplane and in the back ground but very distant a civil airplane that move slow and is bright because the sky is clean and reflect the sun ! after another minute with the corner of my right eye have see a light move very fast in linear direction from southeast to northwest, past 20 second (i think) it had change direction three time in very but very fast manner that none human vehicle can't!
then i believe that it had moved like a plastic bag !
what i see ? i think orbs but very fast compared with civil airplane in brightsunsky , both without sound! then very distant from me! and two noisy  military airplane that take many round in the sky! that fly near enough to see fixed-wing of the plane!
content.summary: Like orbs but very fast compared with civil airplane in brightsunsky , both without sound! then very distant from me! .Two  militar airplane take many round in the sky!

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 3am. 2 september 2014, i saw two bright blue white light travelling in formation. it was only for a brief moment and the lights when dark. my friend came by and told him what i saw and a few minutes later he also saw two bright blue white lights in the sky turn on and then off just west and a little south of where i first saw the lights originally. there is an airport 45 km south of our location, but aircraft normally come from the west to land. and the lights of these objects did not have the characteristics of what are normal marker lights of a plane.
content.summary: Two lights moving travelling nw direction at first then disappear, then appear in two locations to the south. blink on then off in two locations.

content.detailedDescription:
It was 10pm, on saturday night, august 30th. i was talking on my phone with a friend, when i looked up, and saw a plane heading north of phoenix. then, at the same time, i saw a blinking, and slower pulsating object that was flying adjacent to the plane. 

i didn't think about it at first, but then i realized that this object's light was actually blinking very slowly, a lot slower than the planes tail lights that it was flying by. i also realized that commercial planes don't fly that close to each other, and that this other object actually shifted directions after about two minutes in, from when i saw it flying near the plane, and then the object split off from the plane to head nw. 

honestly, i was more busy with the call than to get any evidence. but i wanted to post this sighting to see if any other sky watchers saw this object, or, if it's just a known aircraft. either way, as a sky watcher, these sightings are cool to have, and each one is a learning experience.
content.summary: Talking on the phone, looked up, saw a plane, and then saw a blinking/ slow pulsating light flying by the plane, same path, split nw

content.detailedDescription: I was going in car, suddenly i saw a big ship.When i looked at it i could not move. i got too scared. it dissapeared in clouds , and i could move.
content.summary: I was seeing it , i could not move!! it dissapeared in clouds!

content.detailedDescription:
We are on holiday in cyprus and were outside our villa on a hot night at approx 10pm. i saw a flashing disc in sky which looked like a led disco ball flashing red green blue patterns brightly high up in sky. i called my sister and niece to look.

the object hovered for several minutes with lights flashing in a sequence like a bullseye pattern.    small red circle at centre, bigger green circle of lights then larger blue circle of lights. then repeating sequence and doing different light sequences. then object rotated on its side to show strip of red lights which flashed in sequence then back to circular pattern. 

when we videoed the object the video shows in moving rapidly but it appeared static to the naked eye. 

the object hovered for approx 7 minutes then fell like a leaf until outof view behind trees. we are on a hillside looking down towards the sea so think it descended to sea level.

we all videoed the event on our phones and after the first video the phone froze which was unusual. none of the other phones froze
content.summary: Cyprus sequentially flashing red green blue disc in night sky 1 september

content.detailedDescription: It was labor day, so needed to hang my flag.  i went out with my flag to put it up on my porch pillar bracket.  finishing this, something caught the corner of my vision and i looked up.  there it was, looking like a far away plane, but it did not seem that far away.  it was maybe high enough to be a jet, but had no contrail.  there seemed to be kind of darkish haze about it.  it was plain white and i could not discern wings or other control surfaces, but at that distance and facing aspect such would be difficult to see.  it was moving with some speed bearing about 025 degrees e of north, straight and steady.  something just seemed not right, so i went for my camera which has 26x mag and takes good pictures.  in the ten seconds it took me to get the cam, the thing was gone.  i estimate the place of disappearance as over march arb in riverside, california, about 20 miles away.  suspect the craft was not too high over that base at the time.  i know which direction north is from my house from observing the north star on clear nites, and as an engineer am a fair visualizer of three dimensional spatial and angular relationships.  this was in broad open daylight before 11am in the morning.  i can not be the only one to have seen this.  many at march would have had to have seen it. one of the questions demanded an answer:  did the object do any of..Long list of actions;  but the object did not do anything by move thru the air.  i selected 'reflected light' just to satisfy the stupid computer answer filter.  it sis not reflect anything.  it was white and that is that.
content.summary: Object was on straight course 20d east of north, moving slow over march arb.  object abt 4000' alt. went in to get camera.  gone <10sec. returned and object was gone.

content.detailedDescription: I was out walking my dog, as i usually do between 11pm and 11:30pm. my attention was drawn to a pulsating light (orb) which changed from white, to red to green to blue. it would bob and weave slightly at times, but dramatically at others, but seemed to hold its same position in the sky most of the time. i observed what looked like white sparks dropping downward from this object. it was located about 30 degrees above the horizon in the nw sky. there were no clouds obscuring the object, or any trees. when it moved in the sky, i thought it was my eyes playing tricks on me, but only this object move in relation to the other celestial objects. i observed it for about 10 minutes and then finished the walk. i have observed this same object (i assume) over the last several years, where i appears in a different part of the northern sky depending on the time. i have seen it in the ne sky, with the same behavior. i have observed this for an hour before and woke up my wife to confirm that she saw what i saw. it seems to be a commonly observed object, as i tried to research this on the internet. it seems that it has been reported all over the northern hemisphere. i am not sure if it is a natural phenomena or something else. i definitely know what it is not, and that is anything man made. i would really be interested in finding out what this really is. with a proper telescope, more detail could be revealed.
content.summary: Seen on multiple occasions depending on time. bobs & weaves. pulsates light.

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were swimming in the pool late in the evening 11:30 and approximately 30 minutes later, my husband looked at the ne sky and noticed what appeared to be a planet and asked me if i noticed it - i told him that there was no planet in the ne this month. it seemed to sparkle and have alternating colors and we were unable to determine a distinct shape . it hovered in the sky for over 10 minutes a i got out of the pool to get my astronomy binoculars and gave them to my husband while he was in the pool, he was amazed that the colors of the lights did change  (white, red, blue, green) . my daughter came out and looked at the object, she saw the same thing, then i looked through the binoculars and witnessed the same alternating flashing lights on this hovering object. my husband then found his camcorder and was able to record this object. the object was still in the same spot at 2am. i wanted to report the object to 911 but, my husband told me knot to because we have a family member that works for the local municipal government.
content.summary: Flashing colored lights with no distinct shape

content.detailedDescription: I was in my car and saw two light spiraling in a figure 8 pattern in opposite directions.  very large circumference area. i was at the light for maybe a minute and a half.  it remained there as i drove off.
content.summary: Spiraling white light in sky

content.detailedDescription: I saw a green round light, very bright, it was just sitting in the sky over the mountain in front of me, there were two planes in the sky, it was near them, then all of a sudden it just steaked down the side of the mountain, and was gone. it was amazing, i have never seen anything like it. it was just a brightly glowing round green light, it was probably the size of a small bus best i could tell from were it was it was moving around below some regular planes in the sky, then when i started to watch it was just still for a few seconds, then all of a sudden it streaked down the side of the mountain and was gone. i never saw it again.  this is the first time i have ever reported anything, i did experience one other instance many years back. but it was nothing like this. about 15 yrs ago, i was in manchester ky, early in the morning like 2 or 3 am one niht wile sitting at a stop light with no traffic around, above me was a huge square building just floating over the 4 lane, it was maybe about 40-50 foot above the road. it looked like a huge building just floating across and then it was gone, blocked by the trees, that's all. i wish i could have captured these moments, they were so unexpected, and i do have a witness to both times, i was not alone. i hope my report helps in someway with answers or a better understanding. there really is something strange out there that we dont understand..
content.summary: I saw a green round light, very bright, it was sitting in the sky over the mountain in front of me, there were two planes in the sky, it was near them, then all of a sudden it just steaked down the side of the mountain, and was gone. it was amazing

content.detailedDescription: A buddy and i were enjoying a quiet, clear evening on a west facing deck overlooking the east arm of grand traverse bay in the northern lower peninsula of michigan. the moon was less than half full and becoming orange as it was settling down on the horizon mostly west but slightly southwest of our position. the sky overhead was full of stars and the wind was almost calm though slight, variable breezes would occur. the waves in the bay were moving from north to south. you could hear a truck off in the distance for several miles and several minutes until it faded away. we were waiting for it to disappear so that we could witness complete silence with exception to waves and crickets. at approximately 23:15, i noticed a red light above the bay coming from south to north (left to right). it was common for aircraft to fly along the bay but most often it would be a coastguard helicopter or a care flight air ambulance going from traverse city to charlevoix or petoskey at that time of night. the coast guard helicopter is red and i thought since the light was red it was probably them but i continued to observe expecting to hear the typical sound made by copters and to see a blinking light. i estimated the craft to be 4 miles south of us and pointed it out to my friend. when it had traveled another several seconds i recalled thinking it was traveling the speed i expected a helicopter to move. its course was level and unchanging. when it was about a mile south, i said that it was odd we couldn’t hear it since it was so quiet outside. this made me think maybe it was a small plane of some type since they are sometimes less noisy. i continued to monitor its unchanging flight and at the point it passed the directly in front of our location i asked my friend “what is that? there’s no strobe light and no sound.” he didn’t have an answer and neither did i. at this point, i estimated the object to be about 300 feet above the bay and maybe 5-7 miles out ... which is to say ½ of the way to the leelanua peninsula or right down the middle of the bay. the object never seemed to be definable with regard to shape though it was rounder than any other shape since it was just a fairly bright red light and i guess at that distance it seemed rounded. as i write this recollection it occurs to me that the object may have been a bit closer since i really couldn’t determine its size and i had no sound to use as a guide. nonetheless, the object continued its heading and maintained the same altitude on its northerly flight. i changed my position on the deck in order to continue my observation until trees obstructed my view. i am curious what this was but might tend to believe it is something man made. perhaps a drone of some type.
content.summary: Two men observed silent entity with red light travel appx 4 miles in 3 minutes in straight line at consistent speed and altitude.

content.detailedDescription:
Observing from lookout mountain, watching the fireworks on july 4th, 2014, my husband and i observed multiple lights in triangular formation flying over the denver area. these lights were white/yellow/reddish. there were at least 9 lights because there was several triangles created by these lights, they were definitely not a) fireworks or b) parachuters. i know this because the lights lasted at least 4-5 minutes and flew from denver toward aurora. there are a few people on youtube with comments saying they saw 6-10 lights in aurora that night as well. we thought they might be airplanes but we could hear fireworks from quite a distance (downtown denver) and these lights made no noise whatsoever. several other people nearby made remarks about these lights as well. 
i could not be more of a skeptic, personally. because of this i idiotically did not film these lights with my phone. i assumed i would look up a good explanation for them the next day. i have been looking into this for a time and cannot find a satisfactory explanation. the parachuters that night were probably only 4-5 people at most and the videos i have seen of these do not resemble the lights i saw, which definitely had a trajectory toward the east and formed more than one triangle. i regret not having written this report sooner. i hope someone on lookout mountain that day might have some footage so i can be sure of what i saw.
content.summary: Not parachutes! july 4th ufo event
